name: Sinking Mansion
description:
Play as Pedro Nawabi, a modernperformance artist, on the night of his latest piece of performance art.  Storm the red carpet, give the greatest speech humanity has ever experienced and prepare yourself for a mind boggling finale.

The game is based on a tweet from  the Magical Realism bot on twitter. https://twitter.com/MagicRealismBot?ref_src=twsrc%5Egoogle%7Ctwcamp%5Eserp%7Ctwg...

Use W,A,S,D to move and Space to interact with people and any other form of interaction.
